Reform Ponitentum Religion
The old ways of rivalry with the other races must pass into history. We must realize our shared heritage, lest the Wendigos return to torment us once more.
Ponitentum Reformation

The cold and dark days the Unicorns spent in the North, when icy Wendigos descended upon them, was not soon forgotten. [Root.GetTitledName] has realized the power ponies might draw from harmony and friendship. Though Pegasi and Earth Ponies are different, with different ways and different speech, the Unicorns have noticed their gods are also the gods of all ponies.\n\nAnd though the three races send praise up to heaven for differing blessings, they've seen all prayers fall upon the same ears. Therefore, to strengthen the bonds of kinship amongst the three, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] have convened a council to reform the Unicorn Faith in an effort to emphasize the shared heritage of all three races.
We must never allow such disharmonies to ever plague our people again!
Yes, for the good of all ponies, we must embrace our kinship!
A thousand years we Unicorns endured without the others! And we shall a thousand years more!
Bitter rivals or friends in kin, they're heathens all the same!
